title: U.S. per capita consumption of fresh fruit by fruit type 2018
summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Fruits, and Per capita consumption in pounds in each Fruits on the y axis.
Fruits Bananas has the highest Per capita consumption in pounds and Cherries has the lowest Per capita consumption in pounds.
Fruits Cherries has 21.69 times less Per capita consumption in pounds than Fruits Bananas which is the highest.
